data.text: Yes, I think I totally agree with you but I think this kind of thing is they put labels only on the fast food but let's think in China you don't have a lot of fast food.  You go to a restaurant, in China we like hot teas, hot soup and they bring you something really hot, they're not going to put a label on the bowl so sometimes you don't know you just drink it.  One time what happened to me, my tongue was totally hurt and I couldn't enjoy the rest of the meal so what would you do in that case?
